mapper.select: SELECT ar.parent_id as parentId, mb.mem_level as memLevel, mb.real_name as realName, ar.superior as superior, ar.team_num as teamNum, gt.user_id AS account, SUM(gt.real_bet_amount) AS realBetAmount FROM game_txns gt LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar ON gt.user_id = ar.account INNER JOIN mem_baseinfo mb on gt.user_id = mb.account and gt.create_time >= #{startTime} and gt.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY account,memLevel,realName,superior,teamNum,parentId
